relation: Implement the current recruitment plan and insure the plan addresses the needs of both states.
Train hiring managers on hiring flexibilities.
Retain NRCS employees, make NRCS the employer of choice. Utilize exit interviews determine why employees leave NRCS
One Hispanic male was recruited in MA 9/08 One AA/PI male was recruited in RI 2/09 Other minorities may be recruited as interns in RI for summer ‘09
See above AO to review quarterly report

Four NRCS employees, including one white male, one Native American male, one Asian American female, and one female have left MA but 3 out of 4 are doing so to pursue promotion opportunities within the agency
textBeforeTable: Recruitment – Maintain Ongoing Recruitment and Retention Efforts to Meet Diversity Goals. Goal 5     SEPMs Participate in conferences with under served communities. PB to lead discussion with all SEPMs on way to address action items 5 and 6 below. As Opportunities arise ASC for Operations, SEPMs Work with the District Conservationists on processes used to outreach to under served communities. See 3.5 report in PRS Annually STC's Monitor parity. Quartely outreach reports are also prepared by the PAO Annually STC's Document outreach efforts.
